table.name: presentity
table.description: Table holding presentities for PA module. It is basic PA table, most of other PA tables are related to this one.

column.name: pres_id
column.description: Generated presentity identifier unique across pdomains.

column.name: uri
column.description: Presentity URI used when creating presentity.

column.name: uid
column.description: Presentity UID (unique user identification in SER).
column.name: uuid

description.para: PA domain name. It represents separate "group" of presentities. There can be two pdomains now - named registrar and jabber.
XCAP parameters (in serialized form) used to obtain authorization information.
Stored due to possibility to change user's XCAP parameters from script, but this is quite ineffective and it will be thrown out because XCAP parameters are mostly the same for all presentities.
